annotations.description: In this episode we talk a bit about a close bartending friend Mikki and her amazing Low ABV cocktail! The Vatican City created by my good friend Mikki Kristo...
annotations.title: Vatican City, a fascinating journey into the low ABV!

textContent:
1oz (30ml) Suze
1oz (30ml) Blanc Vermouth
1oz (30ml) Lime Juice
.75oz (22.5ml) Simple Syrup
Top Soda Water
Grapefruit Twist

Shake and strain into collins over ice. 

https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=2vTf6nGvP5U
title: Vatican City
